img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f7/Wukong_LowerHollow_12.jpg)
Beyond him, you'll find yourself on one of the large platforms along the Middle Hollow we couldn't reach earlier, so be sure to check the far left path to find the other side of a broken bridge with a green Wisp to absorb.
img_below_text:
Take the far right path past a few pools of water, and you'll be able to head along the right wall past a Grasshopper Guai to find three Puppet Ticks, who will try to slow you down with webbing and summon Stone Spiders. Defeat them all, you you'll gain the Puppet Tick Spirit from the enemy in the middle of the group.
![Wukong LowerHollow 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b1/Wukong_LowerHollow_13.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 13 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong LowerHollow 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f7/Wukong_LowerHollow_12.jpg)
Beyond him, you'll find yourself on one of the large platforms along the Middle Hollow we couldn't reach earlier, so be sure to check the far left path to find the other side of a broken bridge with a green Wisp to absorb."
            - Following Text: "Take the far right path past a few pools of water, and you'll be able to head along the right wall past a Grasshopper Guai to find three Puppet Ticks, who will try to slow you down with webbing and summon Stone Spiders. Defeat them all, you you'll gain the Puppet Tick Spirit from the enemy in the middle of the group.
![Wukong LowerHollow 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b1/Wukong_LowerHollow_13.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the protagonist, Wukong, is engaged in combat against a large enemy in a dark, rocky environment. The preceding text suggests that Wukong is navigating through the Middle Hollow, having reached a platform with a green Wisp to absorb. The following text indicates that Wukong will soon encounter Puppet Ticks and Stone Spiders, which he must defeat to gain the Puppet Tick Spirit. The image captures the intensity of the battle and the strategic gameplay elements involved in progressing through the Lower Hollow area.
